author: Christine Fisher
title: China reportedly spread COVID-19 misinformation
description: A report by The New York Times claims Chinese operatives helped spread false COVID-19 information via text and social media across the US.  According to US intelligence officials, the Chinese operatives amplified disinformation about a national lockdown, and …
content:
Text message rumors of a national #quarantine are FAKE. There is no national lockdown. @CDCgov has and will continue to post the latest guidance on #COVID19. #coronavirus
— NSC (@WHNSC) March 16, 2020
Two of the six American officials who the NYT spoke with… [+1117 chars]
